com.googlecode.objectify.condition

Class IfTrue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.condition.ValueIf<java.lang.Boolean>
      • com.googlecode.objectify.condition.IfTrue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    If<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Object>

    public class IfTrue
extends ValueIf<java.lang.Boolean>

    Simple If condition that returns true if the value is a boolean true. Note that a null is still false.

    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer
